info.title: PPR API
info.description: Participant Provider Role API is used to obtain deployment instructions from Gaia-X Self-Descriptions

get.description:
Retrieve (and filter) catalogues of Self-Descriptions (GET method)
:param keyword: Substring for filtering within catalogue name or description
:param uuid: Unique id for filtering by catalogue uuid
:return: JSONResponse object (with status code 200 or 400)

get.summary: Retrieve (and filter) Self-Descriptions in the catalogue
get.description:
Retrieve (and filter) Self-Descriptions in the catalogue (GET method)
:param uuid: Unique id of catalogue
:param keyword: Substring for filtering within Self-Description name or description
:param sha256: Unique id for filtering by Self-Description sha256 hash
:return: JSONResponse object (with status code 200 or 400)

schema.title: Response 400 Get Catalogues Uuid Self Descriptions Catalogues  Uuid  Self Descriptions Get

get.summary: Get Self-Description in JSON-LD format from the catalogue
get.description:
Get Self-Description in JSON-LD format from the catalogue (GET method)
:param uuid: Unique id of catalogue
:param sha256: Unique sha256 hash for Self-Description
:return: JSONResponse object (with status code 200 or 400)

schema.title: Response 400 Get Catalogues Uuid Self Descriptions Sha256 Jdon Ld Catalogues  Uuid  Self Descriptions  Sha256  Json Ld Get

get.summary: Get IaC (package and inputs) that implements Self-Description from the catalogue
get.description:
Get IaC (package and inputs) that implements Self-Description from the catalogue (GET method)
:param uuid: Unique id of catalogue
:param sha256: Unique sha256 hash for Self-Description
:param iac_type: Type of IaC (e.g., TOSCA, Terraform)
:return: JSONResponse object (with status code 200 or 400)

schema.title: Response 400 Get Catalogues Uuid Self Descriptions Sha256 Iac Catalogues  Uuid  Self Descriptions  Sha256  Iac Get

get.summary: Download IaC package that implements Self-Description from the catalogue
get.description:
Download IaC package that implements Self-Description from the catalogue (GET method)
:param uuid: Unique id of catalogue
:param sha256: Unique sha256 hash for Self-Description
:param iac_type: Type of IaC (e.g., TOSCA, Terraform)
:return: JSONResponse object (with status code 200 or 400)

schema.title: Response 400 Get Catalogues Uuid Self Descriptions Sha256 Iac Url Catalogues  Uuid  Self Descriptions  Sha256  Iac Url Get

get.summary: Download IaC inputs for IaC package that implements Self-Description from the catalogue
get.description:
Download IaC inputs for IaC package that implements Self-Description from the catalogue (GET method)
:param uuid: Unique id of catalogue
:param sha256: Unique sha256 hash for Self-Description
:param iac_type: Type of IaC (e.g., TOSCA, Terraform)
:return: JSONResponse object (with status code 200 or 400)

schema.title: Response 400 Get Catalogues Uuid Self Descriptions Sha256 Iac Inputs Catalogues  Uuid  Self Descriptions  Sha256  Iac Inputs Get

get.summary: Retrieve (and filter) Self-Descriptions from all catalogues
get.description:
Retrieve (and filter) Self-Descriptions from all catalogues (GET method)
:param keyword: substring for filtering within Self-Description name or description
:param sha256: Unique id for filtering by Self-Description sha256 hash
:return: JSONResponse object (with status code 200 or 400)

schema.title: Response 400 Get Self Descriptions Self Descriptions Get

get.summary: Get Self-Description in JSON-LD format from the catalogue
get.description:
Get Self-Description in JSON-LD format from the catalogue (GET method)
:param sha256: Unique sha256 hash for Self-Description
:return: JSONResponse object (with status code 200 or 400)

schema.title: Response 400 Get Self Descriptions Sha256 Jdon Ld Self Descriptions  Sha256  Json Ld Get

get.summary: Get IaC (package and inputs) that implements Self-Description from the catalogue
get.description:
Get IaC (package and inputs) that implements Self-Description from the catalogue (GET method)
:param sha256: Unique sha256 hash for Self-Description
:param iac_type: Type of IaC (e.g., TOSCA, Terraform)
:return: JSONResponse object (with status code 200 or 400)

schema.title: Response 400 Get Self Descriptions Sha256 Iac Self Descriptions  Sha256  Iac Get

get.summary: Download IaC package that implements Self-Description from the catalogue
get.description:
Download IaC package that implements Self-Description from the catalogue (GET method)
:param sha256: Unique sha256 hash for Self-Description
:param iac_type: Type of IaC (e.g., TOSCA, Terraform)
:return: JSONResponse object (with status code 200 or 400)

schema.title: Response 400 Get Self Descriptions Sha256 Iac Url Self Descriptions  Sha256  Iac Url Get

get.summary: Download IaC inputs for IaC package that implements Self-Description from the catalogue
get.description:
Download IaC inputs for IaC package that implements Self-Description from the catalogue (GET method)
:param sha256: Unique sha256 hash for Self-Description
:param iac_type: Type of IaC (e.g., TOSCA, Terraform)
:return: JSONResponse object (with status code 200 or 400)

schema.title: Response 400 Get Self Descriptions Sha256 Iac Inputs Self Descriptions  Sha256  Iac Inputs Get

IaCType.title: IaCType
IaCType.description: Enum that can distinct between different types of IaC (deployment instructions)
